verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> [is] the LORD'S הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> The earth וּמְלוֹאָ֑הּ <WH4393> and the fulness תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל <WH8398> thereof the world וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> and they that dwell בָֽהּ׃

כִּי־ <WH3588> for ה֭וּא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> upon יַמִּ֣ים <WH3220> it upon the seas יְסָדָ֑הּ <WH3245> For he hath founded וְעַל־ <WH5921> upon נְ֝הָר֗וֹת <WH5104> it upon the floods יְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃ <WH3559> and established

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> Who shall ascend בְהַר־ <WH2022> into the hill יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Jehovah וּמִי־ <WH4310> Who יָ֝קוּם <WH6965> may stand בִּמְק֥וֹם <WH4725> country קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> in his holy

נְקִ֥י <WH5355> He that hath clean כַפַּ֗יִם <WH3709> hands וּֽבַר־ <WH1249> and a pure לֵ֫בָ֥ב <WH3824> heart אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ <WH834> Who לֹא־ <WH3808> has not נָשָׂ֣א <WH5375> who hath not lifted up לַשָּׁ֣וְא <WH7723> unto vanity נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> his soul וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> not נִשְׁבַּ֣ע <WH7650> nor sworn לְמִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> deceitfully

יִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> He shall receive בְ֭רָכָה <WH1293> the blessing מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> from the LORD וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <WH6666> and righteousness מֵאֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> from the God יִשְׁעֽוֹ׃ <WH3468> of his salvation

זֶ֭ה <WH2088> This דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> This [is] the generation [דֹּרְשֹׁו כ] (דֹּרְשָׁ֑יו <WH1875> ask ק) מְבַקְשֵׁ֨י <WH1245> him that seek פָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> thy face יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> O Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

שְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> Lift up שְׁעָרִ֨ים ׀ <WH8179> O ye gates רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם <WH7218> your heads וְֽ֭הִנָּשְׂאוּ <WH5375> and be ye lift up פִּתְחֵ֣י <WH6607> doors עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ye everlasting וְ֝יָב֗וֹא <WH935> shall come in מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and the King הַכָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> of glory

מִ֥י <WH4310> Who זֶה֮ <WH2088> he מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Who [is] this King הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד <WH3519> glorious יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD עִזּ֣וּז <WH5808> strong וְגִבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> and mighty יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> mighty מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> in battle

שְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> Lift up שְׁעָרִ֨ים ׀ <WH8179> O ye gates רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם <WH7218> your heads וּ֭שְׂאוּ <WH5375> even lift [them] up פִּתְחֵ֣י <WH6607> doors עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ye everlasting וְ֝יָבֹא <WH935> shall come in מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and the King הַכָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> of glory

מִ֤י <WH4310> Who ה֣וּא <WH1931> he זֶה֮ <WH2088> is this מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Who is this King הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד <WH3519> of glory יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Jehovah צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts ה֤וּא <WH1931> He מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> he [is] the King הַכָּב֣וֹד <WH3519> of glory סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
